name: Of Pieces and Memories
description:
In Of Pieces and Memories, take control of Briana as she navigates the wizard Godric's house, piecing together her memories of why her twin, Bella, sacrificed her heart.

Controls
Arrow Keys = Move
Shift = Run
Enter or Space = Talk/Interact

Notes: 

  • The way the children move isn't a bug. I thought it was funny when it first happened so I left their movement in the game. :)
